"ソル・ディランダールの肉の調達":
"The quest for the perfect meat is an
endless one. Most would have given up by
now, but I refuse! The meat from a Sol
Dirandal is tough, but if prepared
correctly should really turn some heads!
How long have we been friends? You know
I would do anything for you, so don't let
me down! I know you can do this somehow!
Please, Porfavor bring me some!
※Cae de Nv.50+ Sol Dirandals."
